./.title: Draw Weapon Fight Party - Create & Battle!
./.description: Play Draw Weapon Fight Party and unleash your creativity! Draw your own weapons, enter crazy arena battles, and defeat your opponents with style.

content..game-tagline: Create your weapon and conquer the arena!
content..game-description: Step into the wildest battle arena where your imagination is your weapon! Draw anything from frying pans to laser swords, then fight hilarious opponents in chaotic, fast-paced duels. Can your weapon design win the fight?

how-to-play.html.title: How to Play - Draw Weapon Fight Party
how-to-play.html.description: Learn how to play Draw Weapon Fight Party. Discover how to draw weapons, fight in the arena, and become the last one standing!

content..page-header p: Sketch your weapon, enter the arena, and defeat your rivals in Draw Weapon Fight Party!

news.html.title: News - Draw Weapon Fight Party
news.html.description: Check out the latest updates and features for Draw Weapon Fight Party. Discover new arenas, weapon styles, and challenges.

content..page-header p: Stay tuned for exciting updates, new weapons, and creative content in Draw Weapon Fight Party.

contacts.html.title: Contact Us - Draw Weapon Fight Party
contacts.html.description: Reach out to the team behind Draw Weapon Fight Party for support, suggestions, or questions.

content..page-header p: Got feedback or a cool weapon idea? We'd love to hear from you!

disclaimer.html.title: Disclaimer - Draw Weapon Fight Party
disclaimer.html.description: Disclaimer and terms for using the Draw Weapon Fight Party game and website.

content..page-header p: Important legal info and terms of use for Draw Weapon Fight Party.
